elements.name: my-switch
elements.description:
Switches allow the user to toggle an option on or off.

**Events:**
 - **switch-change,** - undefined

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: this is used to describe the switch - djm

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description:
indicates if switch is on or off 
set default to false  @property name:type lit has built in translators eg type:Boolean so it won't make it a string

properties.name: label
properties.description: this is used to describe the switch - djm

properties.name: checked
properties.description:
indicates if switch is on or off 
set default to false  @property name:type lit has built in translators eg type:Boolean so it won't make it a string
